feed.title: Phylum Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Phylum: releases/v0.4
entry.content: Welcome to the first alpha release of Phylum!

entry.title: New release for Phylum: releases/v0.5
entry.content:
Server - Add support for revokable scoped API Keys - Hash keys and tokens before storing in DB - PKCE challenge support for OIDC logins (Thanks @gbw) - Fix WebDAV access with uuid root - DB schema improvements - Magic link login - Simpler default password requirements

Client - Edit User Display Name - Change Password - Better Login UI
